DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare response rate , duration response , survival rate patient metastatic malignant melanoma treat cisplatin , vinblastine , dacarbazine without interleukin-2 interferon alfa-2b . - Determine toxic effect regimens patient population . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratify accord performance status ( 0 vs 1 ) , prior interferon ( yes v ) , number involve site . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive cisplatin IV 30 minute daily immediately follow vinblastine IV day 1-4 . Patients also receive dacarbazine IV 60 minute day 1 follow vinblastine . - Arm II : Patients receive treatment arm I . Patients also receive interleukin 2 ( IL-2 ) IV continuously day 1-4 interferon alfa-2b subcutaneously ( SC ) daily IL-2 day 1-4 IL-2 day 5 , follow filgrastim ( G-CSF ) ( SC ) daily day 7-16 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 6 week , every 3 month 18 month , every 6 month 18 month , annually 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 482 patient accrue study within 3.5 year .
